sentences.en: a cabinet meeting
sentences.cn: 内阁会议

sentences.en: a member of the Cabinet
sentences.cn: 内阁成员

sentences.en: All together there are six new faces in the cabinet.
sentences.cn: 内阁现在共有6张新面孔。

sentences.en: Cabinet Ministers are selfishly pursuing their own vested interests.
sentences.cn: 内阁大臣们正在自私地追逐他们自己的既得利益。

sentences.en: Cabinet ministers signalled their determination to tough out the controversy.
sentences.cn: 内阁大臣们表明他们将不顾争议坚持下去。

sentences.en: Directly after the meeting, a senior cabinet minister spoke to the BBC.
sentences.cn: 会议刚刚结束，一名高级内阁部长就在英国广播公司的电台上发表了讲话。

sentences.en: Egan crossed to the drinks cabinet and poured a Scotch.
sentences.cn: 伊根穿行来到酒柜旁，倒了一杯苏格兰威士忌。

sentences.en: Every year we used the State of the Union as an organizing tool for the cabinet and staff to come up with new policy ideas, and then we worked hard on how best to present them.
sentences.cn: 每年国情咨文都被内阁和幕僚们作为我们提出新政策思路的一个组织工具，然后我们努力下功夫，让它们以最佳方式呈现在人们面前。

sentences.en: He had the ruthless streak necessary to carry him into the Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他具有进入内阁所必需的冷酷性格。

sentences.en: He is one of the most hawkish members of the new cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他是新内阁中鹰派色彩最浓的成员之一。

sentences.en: He's not a patch on the rest of the Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他远比不上内阁的其他成员。

sentences.en: Political observers believe that a new cabinet may be formed shortly.
sentences.cn: 政治观察家认为新内阁可能很快就会组建。

sentences.en: Six new members have been inducted into the Provincial Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 6名新成员已经正式加入省内阁班子。

sentences.en: The cabinet may backpedal on these commitments.
sentences.cn: 内阁可能背弃这些承诺。

sentences.en: the medicine cabinet
sentences.cn: 药柜

sentences.en: The PM presided over a meeting of his inner Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 首相主持了一次核心内阁会议。

sentences.en: The President chose loyal supporters to serve in his cabinet.
sentences.cn: 总统选择了忠诚的支持者到他的内阁服务。

sentences.en: The special cabinet committee comprises Mr Brown, Mr Mandelson, and Mr Straw.
sentences.cn: 特别内阁委员会包括布朗先生、曼德尔森先生和斯特劳先生。

sentences.en: This issue, more than any other, has divided her cabinet.
sentences.cn: 主要是这一问题使她的内阁产生了分歧。

sentences.en: Two cabinet ministers also got the push.
sentences.cn: 两位内阁大臣也被撤职了。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 政府首脑的参谋团；厨房的餐具柜
影子内阁；（政府首脑挑选的）顾问团
壁橱，壁柜；嵌墙绸，墙面柜

trans.tran_en: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government
